0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company,
       MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
       MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
FROM company_name AS cn,
     company_type AS ct,
     info_type AS it1,
     info_type AS it2,
     movie_companies AS mc,
     movie_info AS mi,
     movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
     title AS t
WHERE cn.country_code = '[us]'
  AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
  AND it1.info = 'genres'
  AND it2.info = 'rating'
  AND mi.info IN ('Drama',
                  'Horror')
  AND mi_idx.info > '8.0'
  AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2005 AND 2008
  AND t.id = mi.movie_id
  AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
  AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
  AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
  AND t.id = mc.movie_id
  AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
  AND cn.id = mc.company_id
  AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
  AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
  AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;
1:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company,
       MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
       MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        info_type AS it1,
        info_type AS it2,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code = '[ru]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND it1.info = 'release dates'
    AND it2.info = 'rating'
    AND mi.info IN ('Bulgaria')
    AND mi_idx.info > '7.0'
    AND t.production_year >2010
    AND t.id = mi.movie_id
    AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
    AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
    AND cn.id = mc.company_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;
2:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company,
       MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
       MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        info_type AS it1,
        info_type AS it2,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND it1.info = 'countries'
    AND it2.info = 'rating'
    AND mi.note LIKE '%internet%' AND mi.info IS NOT NULL AND (mi.info LIKE 'USA:% 199%' OR mi.info LIKE 'USA:% 200%')
    AND mi_idx.info > '9.0'
    AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1980 AND 1995
    AND t.id = mi.movie_id
    AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
    AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
    AND cn.id = mc.company_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company,
       MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
       MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        info_type AS it1,

        movie_companies AS mc,

        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[nl]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND it1.info = 'genres'
    AND it2.info = 'rating'
    AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Denish', 'Norwegian', 'German', 'USA', 'American')
    AND mi_idx.info < '8.5'
    AND t.production_year > 2005
    AND t.id = mi.movie_id
    AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
    AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
    AND cn.id = mc.company_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;

       MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
       MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        info_type AS it1,

        movie_info AS mi,

        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind != 'production companies' AND ct.kind IS NOT NULL
    AND it1.info = 'release dates'
    AND it2.info = 'rating'
    AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Denish', 'Norwegian', 'German')
    AND mi_idx.info < '3.0'
    AND t.production_year > 2005
    AND t.id = mi.movie_id
    AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
    AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
    AND cn.id = mc.company_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;
5:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company,
       MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
       MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        info_type AS it1,
        info_type AS it2,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind != 'production companies' AND ct.kind IS NOT NULL
    AND it1.info = 'genres'
    AND it2.info = 'rating'
    AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Denish', 'Norwegian', 'German', 'USA', 'American')
    AND mi_idx.info < '8.5'
    AND t.production_year > 2000
  AND (t.title LIKE '%Freddy%'
       OR t.title LIKE '%Jason%'
       OR t.title LIKE 'Saw%')
    AND t.id = mi.movie_id
    AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
    AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
    AND cn.id = mc.company_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company,
       MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
       MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        info_type AS it1,
        info_type AS it2,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,

        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]' AND (cn.name LIKE '20th Century Fox%' OR cn.name LIKE 'Twentieth Century Fox%')
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND it1.info = 'release dates'
    AND it2.info = 'rating'
    AND mi.info IS NOT NULL AND (mi.info LIKE 'Japan:%2007%' OR mi.info LIKE 'USA:%2008%')
    AND  mi_idx.info < '7.0'
    AND t.production_year >2010
    AND t.id = mi.movie_id
    AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
    AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
    AND cn.id = mc.company_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;

    FROM company_name AS cn,

        info_type AS it1,
        info_type AS it2,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[de]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND it1.info = 'countries'
    AND it2.info = 'rating'
    AND mi.info IN ('Horror', 'Action', 'Sci-Fi', 'Thriller', 'Crime', 'War')
    AND mi_idx.info < '3.0'
    AND t.production_year >2000 AND (t.title LIKE 'Birdemic%' OR t.title LIKE '%Movie%')
    AND t.id = mi.movie_id
    AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
    AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
    AND cn.id = mc.company_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
    AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;
